title: Modestx Hub For Fantastic Guides
body:
Hello, My name is Modestx.

My goal is to reach at least Diamond 5 this season.
However, I have come to acknowledge that my skills are not at that level.

So on my quest to reaching my goal, I want to share what I am learning. Maybe it will help you too!

**Videos:**

This man is brilliant, logical, and gives great advice. Some of the highlights of his channel that I like are:

His Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/gbay99

How to Stop Losing Streaks - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XxE8wTbYJs8

This is why you're Stuck in "Elo Hell" - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5MTO2a7ZFcc

How to Prevent Your Deaths in League of Legends - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GhVHYNMr7cM

**Other Helpful Videos**

How not to Rage by Siv HD - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vVtmV0FzW_0

**Please Comment and Vote me up :D**

I am willing to coach, if ya wanna learn! :) Just send me a pm.
Also, If enough people ask, I will do commentary on my stream (http://www.twitch.tv/kirruu)

I understand I am only plat, but I still have some knowledge for people to absorb ^^ I was silver last season.... *shiver*
